title: Signing option for ProductName argument
body:
Signtool.exe has '/d' argument for ProductName that is being displayed in the UAC. What is the equivalent option for msbuild based signing task ? How and what argument do I need to pass to achieve this ? 

Signtool.exe :
https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/8s9b9yaz(v=vs.110).aspx

/d  Desc
Specifies a description of the signed content.

nodes.body: My build definition uses Signing Plugin and MSBuild 15.0 of microbuild toolset nuget package.
